description: godoc: update appinit.go, apply !appengine build constrain to main.go

messages.text:
LGTM

We really should add a test for the app engine component of this to
the tree. Nearly every time I go to deploy godoc to app engine,
appinit.go needs some changes.

Hello adg@golang.org, dsymonds@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=c7988b3a8341 ***

godoc: update appinit.go, apply !appengine build constrain to main.go

R=adg, dsymonds
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5969063

subject: code review 5969063: godoc: update appinit.go, apply !appengine build constr...
